snippet: People who light up say their courage comes from laws that have legalized recreational use in other parts of the country, as well as low-key comments about the drug by city leaders.
abstract: Many of New York City's marijuana smokers say they are emboldened to smoke in public by laws legalizing drug in other areas of country and relaxed comments by some city leaders; while smoking marijuana in public remains arresting offense, number of arrests are down and many users express confidence legalization trend sweeping country will arrive in city eventually.
lead_paragraph: People who light up say their courage comes from laws that have legalized recreational use in other parts of the country, as well as low-key comments about the drug by city leaders.

headline.main: In New Era for Marijuana, New York Smokers Get Bolder
headline.print_headline: Smokers Get Bolder in a New Era for Marijuana
